abstract: The automaker posted a record profit for the fiscal year but warned of a slumping market in North America.
snippet: The automaker posted a record profit for the fiscal year but warned of a slumping market in North America.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO, May 9 — Toyota reported another year of record profit today but signaled a slowdown in the current year because of weakness in North America and increased spending.

abstract: Toyota reported another year of record profit but signaled a slowdown in the current year because of weakness in North America and increased spending.
snippet: Toyota reported another year of record profit but signaled a slowdown in the current year because of weakness in North America and increased spending.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO, May 9 — Toyota reported another year of record profit on Wednesday but signaled a slowdown in the current year because of weakness in North America and increased spending.

headline.main: Toyota Posts Another Record but Warns of Slowdown
headline.print_headline: Toyota Posts Another Record but Warns of Slowdown
